programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0116282, Title: Fargo, --- Description: Fargo: Directed by Joel Coen, Ethan Coen. With William H. Macy, Steve Buscemi, Peter Stormare, Kristin Rudrüd. Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116282/","name":"Fargo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJiZDgyZjctYmRjMS00ZjdkLTkwMTEtNGU1NDg3NDQ0Yzk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000513/","name":"William H. Macy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000531/","name":"Frances McDormand","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000114/","name":"Steve Buscemi"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001054/","name":"Joel Coen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001053/","name":"Ethan Coen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106129/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001053/","name":"Ethan Coen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001054/","name":"Joel Coen"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fargo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2228618777","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmExN2VjZTMtMzhlNi00NDRiLWE0YzAtNDFiNjc2ZTUyZTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmExN2VjZTMtMzhlNi00NDRiLWE0YzAtNDFiNjc2ZTUyZTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Fargo Only Be version","datePublished":"1996-04-05","description":"Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.","keywords":"black comedy,botched crime,snow,fargo north dakota,americana","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116282/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1","dateCreated":"2006-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Effort From A Number Of People","reviewBody":"I didn't see this in the theater but saw it the first week it was out for rental, and have enjoyed it ever since. In fact, I probably enjoy this more each time I view it. It's a sick movie, though, make no mistake about that. However, it holds a strange fascination, probably because of the odd characters.

About the story: first, it is NOT a true story as indicated in the movie. That's a lie. It's a fictional kidnapping-turned into murder story with a few bloody scenes, lots of profanity (most of it by Steve Buscemi) and a comedy. Yup, this is pure "black comedy." It's dark humor mixed in with a parody about the way the Scandanavian people in the upper Midwest supposedly speak.

Both William H. Macy and Frances McDormand have some wonderful facial expressions along with their accents. Those two and Buscemi are the lead characters and all three "are a trip." Macy is hilarious; the best character in here, in my opinion. The more I watch this film, the funnier he gets. It's also the best role, I assume, ever for McDormand who was never a star before - or since - this movie. Her character in here, "Marge Gunderson," elevates this movie from just another modern-day sick crime movie, to an original. It's nice to see a wonderful husband-wife relationship, too, as is shown here with her and husband "Norm" (John Lynch).

You have this clean, old-fashioned lady cop (McDormand), a middle-of-the-road bungling car salesman (Macy) and two extreme low-life killers in "Carl Showalter" (Buscemi) and "Gaear Grimsrud" (Peter Stormare) all combining to make this story a mixture not only of people but genres. Other minor characters are strange, too, led by one of Marge's old high school acquaintances "Mike Yanagita" (Steve Park). Add to that some equally-bizarre music (slow violins) and you have this unusual story that brings out the morbid fascination in us viewers.

So, I guess what I am saying is this movie truly is an original, the best film the Coen Brothers have ever made and maybe the rest roles ever for the three main actors, McDormand, Macy and Buscemi.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":633292,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

acting performance. True to life story. Original. Bleak, yet impressive.","reviewBody":"These kind of stories about loosers dont get made a lot. NOT a crowd pleaser. Dont think for a second you will get to see Charlize Theron in any kind of hot or glamorous scenes. She plays a character that is dead inside. Mentally scarred for life. But she is unaware of it. She is about to find out though when she revisits her old highschool friends.

Some movies are simply a kick in my gut. This is one of those. I would not recommend it to any of my friends who want to be entertained. BUT if one wants to see a really true to life story about PAIN and ISOLATION then this is the movie for you...

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0116282, Title: Fargo, --- Description: Fargo: Directed by Joel Coen, Ethan Coen. With William H. Macy, Steve Buscemi, Peter Stormare, Kristin Rudrüd. Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116282/","name":"Fargo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJiZDgyZjctYmRjMS00ZjdkLTkwMTEtNGU1NDg3NDQ0Yzk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000513/","name":"William H. Macy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000531/","name":"Frances McDormand","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000114/","name":"Steve Buscemi"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001054/","name":"Joel Coen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001053/","name":"Ethan Coen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106129/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001053/","name":"Ethan Coen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001054/","name":"Joel Coen"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fargo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2228618777","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmExN2VjZTMtMzhlNi00NDRiLWE0YzAtNDFiNjc2ZTUyZTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmExN2VjZTMtMzhlNi00NDRiLWE0YzAtNDFiNjc2ZTUyZTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Fargo Only Be version","datePublished":"1996-04-05","description":"Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.","keywords":"black comedy,botched crime,snow,fargo north dakota,americana","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116282/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1","dateCreated":"2006-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Effort From A Number Of People","reviewBody":"I didn't see this in the theater but saw it the first week it was out for rental, and have enjoyed it ever since. In fact, I probably enjoy this more each time I view it. It's a sick movie, though, make no mistake about that. However, it holds a strange fascination, probably because of the odd characters.

About the story: first, it is NOT a true story as indicated in the movie. That's a lie. It's a fictional kidnapping-turned into murder story with a few bloody scenes, lots of profanity (most of it by Steve Buscemi) and a comedy. Yup, this is pure "black comedy." It's dark humor mixed in with a parody about the way the Scandanavian people in the upper Midwest supposedly speak.

Both William H. Macy and Frances McDormand have some wonderful facial expressions along with their accents. Those two and Buscemi are the lead characters and all three "are a trip." Macy is hilarious; the best character in here, in my opinion. The more I watch this film, the funnier he gets. It's also the best role, I assume, ever for McDormand who was never a star before - or since - this movie. Her character in here, "Marge Gunderson," elevates this movie from just another modern-day sick crime movie, to an original. It's nice to see a wonderful husband-wife relationship, too, as is shown here with her and husband "Norm" (John Lynch).

You have this clean, old-fashioned lady cop (McDormand), a middle-of-the-road bungling car salesman (Macy) and two extreme low-life killers in "Carl Showalter" (Buscemi) and "Gaear Grimsrud" (Peter Stormare) all combining to make this story a mixture not only of people but genres. Other minor characters are strange, too, led by one of Marge's old high school acquaintances "Mike Yanagita" (Steve Park). Add to that some equally-bizarre music (slow violins) and you have this unusual story that brings out the morbid fascination in us viewers.

So, I guess what I am saying is this movie truly is an original, the best film the Coen Brothers have ever made and maybe the rest roles ever for the three main actors, McDormand, Macy and Buscemi.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":633292,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Directed by John Crowley. With Oakes Fegley, Ansel Elgort, Nicole Kidman, Jeffrey Wright. A boy in New York is taken in by a wealthy family after his mother is killed in a bombing at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. programme.title: Western Stars
Western Stars
programme.desc:
Western Stars: Directed by Bruce Springsteen, Thom Zimny. With Patti Scialfa, Bruce Springsteen. Live concert performance of Bruce Springsteen singing songs from his album 'Western Stars'." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10687158/","name":"Western Stars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk2ZjY1MjgtOTEzZi00MWZjLTg5ZmItNDgzMTNmM2QxYTA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Documentary","Music"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778393/","name":"Patti Scialfa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0819803/","name":"Bruce Springsteen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0819803/","name":"Bruce Springsteen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956890/","name":"Thom Zimny"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0580020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0456097/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1884011545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZjMDMwZmItOWE4NC00Njg4LWE1OGQtYTM4MTRkZDBhZjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZjMDMwZmItOWE4NC00Njg4LWE1OGQtYTM4MTRkZDBhZjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bruce Springsteen invites you to experience his latest album as a special cinematic event."},"datePublished":"2019-10-25","description":"Live concert performance of Bruce Springsteen singing songs from his album 'Western Stars'.","keywords":"singing","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10687158/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chong_an"},"dateCreated":"2019-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"A very good concert album with introductions","reviewBody":"Instead of touring his latest album, Bruce Springsteen made this movie of its contents. It was mostly recorded in his century-old barn, with a 30-piece orchestra, some new vocal arrangements by Patti Scialfa, and an audience of a few friends and the horses in the stables below.

Each song is introduced by Bruce, often as a voiceover as various images play, some of which are Bruce's archival photos or home movie clips. The lynchpin song is Western Stars, about an old cowboy still going on, when many of his contemporaries have left their boots (a song likely to be self-referential, given his approaching 70th birthday).

I saw this film at the Toronto International Film Festival, but not at the premium-priced world premiere, so Bruce had already left, leaving fellow director Thom Zimmy to answer questions. Bruce's directorial contributions included writing and producing the song introductions, and co-selecting the archival material to include. The intros make it feel that this album is a collection of poems set to music. With songs about cars, trains, heartbreak, and love, I wonder if someone will do a full country re-creation of the material. The film ends with a bonus song (that fits the overall theme), which is more upbeat than Moonlight Motel.

Even being only casually acquainted with Bruce's music, I found this film fascinating. It is probably a must-see for actual fans, especially those who have already memorized the lyrics. It is expected to open commercially October 25.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1583,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

Live concert performance of Bruce Springsteen singing songs from his album 'Western Stars'." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10687158/","name":"Western Stars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk2ZjY1MjgtOTEzZi00MWZjLTg5ZmItNDgzMTNmM2QxYTA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Documentary","Music"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778393/","name":"Patti Scialfa","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0819803/","name":"Bruce Springsteen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0819803/","name":"Bruce Springsteen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956890/","name":"Thom Zimny"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0580020/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0456097/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1884011545","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZjMDMwZmItOWE4NC00Njg4LWE1OGQtYTM4MTRkZDBhZjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZjMDMwZmItOWE4NC00Njg4LWE1OGQtYTM4MTRkZDBhZjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bruce Springsteen invites you to experience his latest album as a special cinematic event.","datePublished":"2019-10-25","description":"Live concert performance of Bruce Springsteen singing songs from his album 'Western Stars'.","keywords":"singing","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10687158/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"chong_an","dateCreated":"2019-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"A very good concert album with introductions","reviewBody":"Instead of touring his latest album, Bruce Springsteen made this movie of its contents. It was mostly recorded in his century-old barn, with a 30-piece orchestra, some new vocal arrangements by Patti Scialfa, and an audience of a few friends and the horses in the stables below.

Each song is introduced by Bruce, often as a voiceover as various images play, some of which are Bruce's archival photos or home movie clips. The lynchpin song is Western Stars, about an old cowboy still going on, when many of his contemporaries have left their boots (a song likely to be self-referential, given his approaching 70th birthday).

I saw this film at the Toronto International Film Festival, but not at the premium-priced world premiere, so Bruce had already left, leaving fellow director Thom Zimmy to answer questions. Bruce's directorial contributions included writing and producing the song introductions, and co-selecting the archival material to include. The intros make it feel that this album is a collection of poems set to music. With songs about cars, trains, heartbreak, and love, I wonder if someone will do a full country re-creation of the material. The film ends with a bonus song (that fits the overall theme), which is more upbeat than Moonlight Motel.

Even being only casually acquainted with Bruce's music, I found this film fascinating. It is probably a must-see for actual fans, especially those who have already memorized the lyrics. It is expected to open commercially October 25.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1583,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"duration":"PT1H23M"</script><metacontent="

Harry Potter i więzień Azkabanu
programme.desc:

Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0304141/","name":"Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY4NTIwODg0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTc0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0705356/","name":"Daniel Radcliffe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914612/","name":"Emma Watson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342488/","name":"Rupert Grint"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K. Rowling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460141/","name":"Steve Kloves"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2007761177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4OTU3ZjctYTBmNi00MTk2LTlhZTgtZWQyMmM1MmI5NmQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4OTU3ZjctYTBmNi00MTk2LTlhZTgtZWQyMmM1MmI5NmQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"datePublished":"2004-06-03","description":"Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.","keywords":"magic,wizard,school of magic,wrongful conviction,magical map","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0304141/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"colettesplace"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best of the Harry Potter films so far","reviewBody":"This third Harry Potter film is the best one yet. Director Alphonso Cuaron (Y Tu Mama Tambien, A Little Princess) has taken over from Chris Columbus and has stuck less slavishly to the original JK Rowling Books.

Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson are back as Harry, Ron and Hermoine, with Hermoine in particular getting to do a lot more. There are less Quidditch matches, and more menace, in keeping with the improved complexity of Rowling's third novel. Hogwarts is not safe, Draco Malfoy is no longer a menace, but just a pain in the ass. And the new CGI-scripted character Buckbeak the Hippogriff (half eagle, half horse) looks fantastic and has personality.The kids are all supposed to be thirteen but look older - hey we'll forgive them. Neville Longbottom has lost so much weight he's almost unrecognisable.

Great performances from Emma Thompson hamming it up as the ditsy professor of foretelling, Prof Trelawny, Michael Gambon as the new Professor Dumbledore (not as magical but good), David Thewliss as Prof Lupin, and Gary Oldman as the Prisoner of Azkhaban.Thrilling, complex, menacing, ****/***** stars.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":568560,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"duration":"PT2H22M"}</script><metacontent="

Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0330373/","name":"Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI1NDMyMjExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTc4MjQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0705356/","name":"Daniel Radcliffe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914612/","name":"Emma Watson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342488/","name":"Rupert Grint"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001565/","name":"Mike Newell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176128/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460141/","name":"Steve Kloves"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K. Rowling"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2611740953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY3NzkxMjMtZjMwNy00OTYwLWJhNDktZDgwZDZmMzZmOWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY3NzkxMjMtZjMwNy00OTYwLWJhNDktZDgwZDZmMzZmOWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"datePublished":"2005-11-23","description":"Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.","keywords":"tournament,wizard,magic,school of magic,heroism","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0330373/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Asutian"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best by far","reviewBody":"I must say I am extremely sick of this movie, though not for conventional reasons. Nine reels is a lot to put together and screening a three hour movie can be exhausting, especially when you're trying to write several term papers during the same week it is coming out. You see, I am a projectionist and getting this movie ready for a midnight show was part of my job. I realize that the fact that I was paid $14.50/hr to watch this movie on Wednesday night might give rise to feelings of jealousy among some, but I am currently wishing I could manage to get more than five hours of sleep sometime soon.

All that said I must say this was by far the greatest Harry Potter film so far. Although it was long, it did not drag on. It had a nice, tight feel to it. It progressed from scene to scene with a smoothness that I find to be lacking in many movies adapted from books. The acting has noticeably improved from the first three, and the more adult feel to this one really drew me in. Perhaps the most interesting aspect of this movie was the fact that it felt like a mix of genres. It had an epic feel to it. After all it is about good v. evil and battling the dark wizards, etc. This movie,however, also felt like a high school movie. It had the issues of coming of age, which makes sense as the characters begin to mature. Ultimately it came off a lot more loyal to the book in theme than I think the last one did. (The first two, while loyal, I found to be relatively campy and childish.) 

This movie, like many, does have its shortfalls. I believe that Dumbledore was portrayed as a little too intense, like an old Al Pacino. Instead of the benevolent, kind, and good-humored old man I have always loved in the books. As someone that has read the books, I must say another shortfall is that this movie banks on familiarity with the story. Having read the books, I found it very easy to follow, but I could understand how one who has not read the books may feel a bit lost, as some important information was left out and some back-story was left mostly unexplained.

All in all I would say this is definitely the best movie in this series so far, and if the next three are on par with this one then I would be content.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":564325,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"duration":"PT2H37M"}</script><metacontent="

The kids go head to head with an unstoppable enemy who has targeted Leslie -- or more accurately, the child she's carrying. Nico draws them all into a dark realm where its ruler Morgan le Fay is much more nefarious than anyone the kids have yet to face."},"datePublished":"2017-11-21","description":"After discovering their parents are super-villains in disguise, a group of teenagers band together to run away from their homes in order to atone for their parents' actions and to discover the secrets of their origins.","keywords":"shared universe,superheroine,teenager,super villain,marvel cinematic universe","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1236246/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eisenmyer1234"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"OK show. Thought it would be better","reviewBody":"The show is moving at a much slower pace than the trailer suggested which I wouldn't have minded had the show been any good. Runaways is decent at best with mundane script writing and an over saturation of clichéd characters. They've introduced so many characters early on that you're almost perplexed at times as to who's who and their relation to the other characters as well as their relevance to whatever the plot is becoming. As for the plot, it tries to be too mysterious and foreboding that it only confuses itself in numerous plot holes and bad character decisions for the sake of extending the story and providing unnecessary drama.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23011,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7}}</script><metacontent="

Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi510959897","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyMWRkZDctZDdkNi00OWQ1LTg3NTMtNTY1NDk5MTAwMTM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyMWRkZDctZDdkNi00OWQ1LTg3NTMtNTY1NDk5MTAwMTM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Sanctuary: Season Four","datePublished":"2008-10-03","description":"Stem cells, gene therapy, transplants, and cloning have changed the definition of "humanity" in the modern world, but the darker side contains monsters that only few are brave enough to face, because the future lies in their hands.","keywords":"2000s,2010s,paranormal phenomena,psychotronic series,evolution","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0965394/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"umar_n12","dateCreated":"2008-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Getting pretty good!","reviewBody":"This is a review of the first season on TV, which should really be known as season 1 on IMDb, and the webisodes season 0.

Essentially there are three main characters, all of which believable, even Tapping's accent, and I'm saying that as a Brit. She's great as Magnus, not overdone, but sensitive, slightly badass and played right. She has a daughter, Ashley. She's instantly likable and Emelie Ullerup doesn't fall into the trap of making her the typical blond 'Yeah, uhuh I like totally, like, kick- ass. Isn't that cool!' character. Instead she's much better and thankfully without a teenage crisis. I'll get onto Robin Dunne's excellent Will in a sec.

Sanctuary is more than just the sum of its parts. It has a great grittiness to it, a real world, almost familiar environment. It's slightly dark, but optimistic at the same part. 30 minutes into the pilot and I really liked it. Will was believable, I even liked and sympathised with him. the way it was done felt like a feature, not really like an hour long weekly show. The whole actual Sanctuary concept wasn't done too fantastically. However I felt it wasn't perfect but it's taken me 2 more episodes to think that actually it's worth continuing to watch.

For Brits, its on ITV 4, mondays at 9. Or 8. Pretty sure it's 9, but check. if you don't have ITV 4, it's on their catch up thing on the site. For Americans it's on Hulu and Sci Fi's Rewind.

Have fun getting into it, looking forward to see where it goes.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19555,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0407362, Title: Battlestar Galactica, --- Description: Battlestar Galactica: Created by Glen A. Larson, Ronald D. Moore. With Edward James Olmos, Mary McDonnell, Jamie Bamber, James Callis. When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fabled 13th colony, Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0407362/","name":"Battlestar Galactica","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBjMjk4YWQtZjY1MC00NTI5LWEwZDMtYWMyYjk2MjkzMThhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001579/","name":"Edward James Olmos","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001521/","name":"Mary McDonnell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0051397/","name":"Jamie Bamber"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103727/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176813/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129175/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488991/","name":"Glen A. Larson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. Moore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Battlestar Galactica: Season 4.0","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4258118937","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjkxNGJlZjctOTUzMy00YTIxLTg3NDItMDM4NjA5MGVlZmZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjkxNGJlZjctOTUzMy00YTIxLTg3NDItMDM4NjA5MGVlZmZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Battlestar Galactica: Season 4.0","datePublished":"2005-01-14","description":"When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fabled 13th colony, Earth.","keywords":"human in outer space,nuclear weapon,totalitarianism,prophecy,space opera","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0407362/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"polemistis-1","dateCreated":"2004-11-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Open your mind and reap the rewards!!","reviewBody":"As a long time fan of the original series of Battlestar Galactica I was apprehensive at best when I heard of the new 're-imagining'. However, I always like to keep an open mind and decide for myself, not take what the critics say as gospel!

I am very glad I do this!

The new series of Battlestar Galactica is excellent!! It's well directed, produced and acted. It's got a new depth and excitement to it. It's visually stunning, and has the ability to completely absorb the viewer into each episode. In short, it's a breath of fresh air!!

I beg other fans of the original series to give it a chance. Okay, so Starbuck and Boomer are women, so what!?! The new Cylons are cool, the ships are fantastic, the characters are wonderful, the relationships are very interesting and, as it's basis is the original story line, there's an oddly comforting familiarity there too. Anyone with doubts should give it a go. It won't disappoint!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":155717,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7</script><metacontent="

A secret military team, SG-1, is formed to explore other planets through the recently discovered Stargates." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0118480/","name":"Stargate SG-1","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MjEwMTc5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQ2NjQ4NA@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000760/","name":"Richard Dean Anderson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788218/","name":"Michael Shanks","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0850102/","name":"Amanda Tapping"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129774/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005244/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0214390/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322106/","name":"Jonathan Glassner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942249/","name":"Brad Wright"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stargate SG-1: The Complete Tenth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi444989721","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzczMjM1M2MtNzFjZi00ZWYwLTlkNzAtOGQwN2E2MzdhMDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzczMjM1M2MtNzFjZi00ZWYwLTlkNzAtOGQwN2E2MzdhMDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment","datePublished":"1997-07-27","description":"A secret military team, SG-1, is formed to explore other planets through the recently discovered Stargates.","keywords":"shared universe,military,message from outer space,alternate history,2000s","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118480/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"johndec","dateCreated":"2004-11-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well Done!","reviewBody":"The movie was groundbreaking, and its ideas had great potential for further development. Usually, sequels are made to continue the story on the big screen. Creating this excellent series was a much better decision than producing lousy sequels for the masses. 

Fans of the movie get to further explore all the ideas: The Stargate system, used by humans to travel the galaxy for thousands of years; Egyptian, Norse, and alien mythology; true science fiction - with fictional devices and concepts based on current science; and human exploration of our known universe  part of what made Star Trek so popular. 

You see the characters develop over time, the quirky unexpected humor, the use of an alien who doesn't fully understand American English (like Data), the struggle of the oppressed, the lengths humans go in order to survive, politics and government bureaucracy, and the underlying tenet that there is more to human life then our brief appearance on planet Earth.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":85393,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4</script><metacontent="

A secret military team, SG-1, is formed to explore other planets through the recently discovered Stargates." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0118480/","name":"Stargate SG-1","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MjEwMTc5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQ2NjQ4NA@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000760/","name":"Richard Dean Anderson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788218/","name":"Michael Shanks","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0850102/","name":"Amanda Tapping"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129774/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005244/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0214390/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322106/","name":"Jonathan Glassner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942249/","name":"Brad Wright"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stargate SG-1: The Complete Tenth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi444989721","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzczMjM1M2MtNzFjZi00ZWYwLTlkNzAtOGQwN2E2MzdhMDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzczMjM1M2MtNzFjZi00ZWYwLTlkNzAtOGQwN2E2MzdhMDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment","datePublished":"1997-07-27","description":"A secret military team, SG-1, is formed to explore other planets through the recently discovered Stargates.","keywords":"shared universe,military,message from outer space,alternate history,2000s","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118480/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"johndec","dateCreated":"2004-11-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well Done!","reviewBody":"The movie was groundbreaking, and its ideas had great potential for further development. Usually, sequels are made to continue the story on the big screen. Creating this excellent series was a much better decision than producing lousy sequels for the masses. 

Fans of the movie get to further explore all the ideas: The Stargate system, used by humans to travel the galaxy for thousands of years; Egyptian, Norse, and alien mythology; true science fiction - with fictional devices and concepts based on current science; and human exploration of our known universe  part of what made Star Trek so popular. 

You see the characters develop over time, the quirky unexpected humor, the use of an alien who doesn't fully understand American English (like Data), the struggle of the oppressed, the lengths humans go in order to survive, politics and government bureaucracy, and the underlying tenet that there is more to human life then our brief appearance on planet Earth.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":85393,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4</script><metacontent="

for Sanctuary: Season Four","datePublished":"2008-10-03","description":"Stem cells, gene therapy, transplants, and cloning have changed the definition of "humanity" in the modern world, but the darker side contains monsters that only few are brave enough to face, because the future lies in their hands.","keywords":"2000s,2010s,paranormal phenomena,psychotronic series,evolution","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0965394/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"umar_n12","dateCreated":"2008-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Getting pretty good!","reviewBody":"This is a review of the first season on TV, which should really be known as season 1 on IMDb, and the webisodes season 0.

Essentially there are three main characters, all of which believable, even Tapping's accent, and I'm saying that as a Brit. She's great as Magnus, not overdone, but sensitive, slightly badass and played right. She has a daughter, Ashley. She's instantly likable and Emelie Ullerup doesn't fall into the trap of making her the typical blond 'Yeah, uhuh I like totally, like, kick- ass. Isn't that cool!' character. Instead she's much better and thankfully without a teenage crisis. I'll get onto Robin Dunne's excellent Will in a sec.

Sanctuary is more than just the sum of its parts. It has a great grittiness to it, a real world, almost familiar environment. It's slightly dark, but optimistic at the same part. 30 minutes into the pilot and I really liked it. Will was believable, I even liked and sympathised with him. the way it was done felt like a feature, not really like an hour long weekly show. The whole actual Sanctuary concept wasn't done too fantastically. However I felt it wasn't perfect but it's taken me 2 more episodes to think that actually it's worth continuing to watch.

For Brits, its on ITV 4, mondays at 9. Or 8. Pretty sure it's 9, but check. if you don't have ITV 4, it's on their catch up thing on the site. For Americans it's on Hulu and Sci Fi's Rewind.

Have fun getting into it, looking forward to see where it goes.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19555,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3</script><metacontent="

I really wish everyone gets to see this special movie, but it is especially recommended for those who are caregivers.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7324,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4096179737","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVkN2UxZTgtMmZiYi00OWM0LThjMjYtOTEyMDViOTg4YjYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVkN2UxZTgtMmZiYi00OWM0LThjMjYtOTEyMDViOTg4YjYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"datePublished":"2020-06-26","description":"A Democratic strategist helps a retired veteran run for mayor in a small, conservative Midwest town.","keywords":"political satire,american politics,election campaign,rural america,marine veteran","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9076562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sir_AmirSyarif"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A rather toothless critique of the modern American political process","reviewBody":"Jon Stewart's 'Irresistible' is a critique of the modern American political process but it is rather toothless. The plot is rich but it only skims the surface of the problems but does not address any of it. It has some clever moments, wits, and twists. But, as a whole, it is forgettable, you wont remember or care to remember a thing after finishing the movie. The humor, in general, is too broad and feels flat. Steve Carell delivers a steadily funny and wholesome performance, while the underutilized Rose Byrne portrays the evil and seductive strategist perfectly.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14057,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

Stan's bullied high school buddy can use a monster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8236366/","name":"The Shed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmJjNzY5MjItMmVjNy00OWJjLTliNDYtYWIxYTU1ODA2OWY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4487395/","name":"Jay Jay Warren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4927593/","name":"Cody Kostro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8961618/","name":"Sofia Happonen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2876628/","name":"Frank Sabatella"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247116/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0228008/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11174712/","name":"Jason Rice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2876628/","name":"Frank Sabatella"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3757686553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2FhZjRiY2EtNjYxYy00NzFjLWFiODAtMWNkODA3ODNjMzcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2FhZjRiY2EtNjYxYy00NzFjLWFiODAtMWNkODA3ODNjMzcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Stan lives with his abusive grandfather and tries to protect his best friend from high school bullies. When he discovers a murderous creature has taken refuge inside his tool shed, he tries to battle the demon alone until his bullied friend discovers the creature and has a far more sinister plan."},"datePublished":"2019-11-15","description":"A hunter gets bitten by a vampire and runs into a shed to avoid sunlight. Stan, a 17 y.o. on probation, and his supervisor grandpa live next to it. Stan's bullied high school buddy can use a monster.","keywords":"school,natural horror,creature feature","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8236366/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"robbierobin"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ummm OK kinda","reviewBody":"It had plenty of scenes that simply didn't make sense and pretty obvious what type of things were about to happen all throughout the movie. However there was a bit of a plot twist in the end.

The two things that seemed unbearably nonsensical to me, is, (one) if you have a vampire living in your wooden shed on a farm, far away from people, why in heavens would you not set it ablaze during one of the many sunny days available?

Secondly, even though the vampire wronged the main character, the vampire seems to have a personal vendetta out for him for absolutely no reason whatsoever.

There's no backstory, so you really don't know what's the deal with the vampire population. Is it just the one at the beginning, what are the rules, etc","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1863,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

A Welsh journalist breaks the news in the western media of the famine in Ukraine in the early 1930s." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6828390/","name":"Mr. Jones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIzMGZlNGQtNWFlMC00NDc1LTliNmQtNDA3ODRlYzhjMGNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Biography","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3584268/","name":"James Norton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3948952/","name":"Vanessa Kirby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0765597/","name":"Peter Sarsgaard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002140/","name":"Agnieszka Holland"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0491378/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0352409/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10388460/","name":"Andrea Chalupa"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi392806169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjliNjIxNmUtZmQ0Ny00YjRkLWFmYTgtM2NlMDQ3MmZmOTAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjliNjIxNmUtZmQ0Ny00YjRkLWFmYTgtM2NlMDQ3MmZmOTAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Gareth Jones, an ambitious Welsh journalist, travelled to the Soviet Union in 1933 and uncovered the appalling truth behind the Soviet "utopia". His quest quickly turned into a life-or-death journey... helping inspire Orwell's Animal Farm."},"datePublished":"2019-10-25","description":"A Welsh journalist breaks the news in the western media of the famine in Ukraine in the early 1930s.","keywords":"ukraine,soviet union,holodomor,famine,genocide","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6828390/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SteveMierzejewski"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Back in the USSR","reviewBody":"This is a powerful film which I'm afraid few people will watch. Even those who watch it, may feel the situations it portrays are exaggerated or completely made up. They are not. The problems caused by Stalin in Ukraine are, if anything, downplayed.

But beyond the historical accuracy are the questions about the behavior of the people and their morality as it is portrayed in the film. Did diplomats and politicians really behave like this? Not only did they behave like this. They continue to behave like this. I've worked in government NGOs overseas and I've seen the insincerity of most diplomats close up. I've also experienced their ability to blind themselves of the truth if the truth endangers their high paid positions.

There are people out there now who know the truth and who are being told to keep quiet. There are people I've known who were undermined when trying to do what was right. So, this movie is telling the truth for them. You may not like what it has to say, but who says the truth has to be pleasant.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7885,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"duration":"PT2H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: And Then We Danced
A potem tańczyliśmy
programme.desc: And Then We Danced: Directed by Levan Akin. With Levan Gelbakhiani, Bachi Valishvili, Ana Javakishvili, Kakha Gogidze. A passionate coming-of-age tale set amidst the conservative confines of modern Tbilisi, the film follows Merab, a competitive dancer who is thrown off balance by the arrival of Irakli, a fellow male dancer with a rebellious streak." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8963708/","name":"And Then We off balance by the arrival of Irakli, a fellow male dancer with a rebellious streak.","keywords":"dance,coming out,georgian dance,gay romance,audition","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8963708/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaSerf"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"A subtle and delicate antidote to oppression...","reviewBody":"This is a superb film that depicts an excerpt in the life of a young man from Tbilisi - "Merab" (Levan Gelbakhiani) who balances his work in his family restaurant with his training to be a classical dancer at a very tough school that emphasises the masculinity and traditions of ancient Georgian dance. His life is somewhat turned upside down by the antics of his wayward brother and by the appearance of "Irakli" (Bachi Valishvili) at the dance school - a man with whom he starts to explore more of his own personal identity in a culture that takes an exceptionally dim view of homosexuality. Gelbakhiani is super here; he genuinely can dance - and the emotive themes that conveys are simple and special. The use of the traditional musical accompaniment - with frequently just a drum (and a wee bit of Abba) - all adds to this gently authentic slice of the life of this aspiring and inspirational young man on his way, we hope, to better things. The last five minutes are a wonderful demonstration of his skill/perserverance and determination.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10311,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Joanna Kulig, Adam Woronowicz, Alan Tybulczuk

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Zimny poranek w odkrywkowej kopalni kruszców. Krzysztof (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna pierwszy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika. Wyraźnie nie pasuje on do środowiska pracowników fizycznych. W trosce o własną pozycję, zamierza trzymać dyscyplinę twardą ręką. Nagły wypadek, którego ofiarą staje się jeden z ukraińskich robotników, wystawia zasady moralne Krzysztofa na próbę. Zdaje on sobie sprawę z tego, że łatwo być stanowczym tylko w sprzyjających okolicznościach. Jednak trudno mu przeciwstawić się złu, kiedy w grę wchodzą dramatyczne konsekwencje.

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damięcki
Artem Manuilov
Andrzej Grabowski

programme.title: Leszy
programme.desc: Krzysiek, po dziesięciu latach nieobecności, zabiera swojego syna na polowanie. Mężczyzna poprzez wyprawę myśliwską chce odzyskać zaufanie syna i nadrobić stracony czas. Adrenalina, alkohol i miło spędzony czas sprawiają, że mężczyźni się do siebie zbliżają. Jednak niedojrzałość Krzysztofa prowadzi doprowadza do wielkiej tragedii.

credits.actor: Tadeusz Ratuszniak
Łukasz Gawroński
Dominika Sakowicz

programme.title: Myszy i szczury
programme.desc: Dramatyczne losy małego Adasia (Miłosz Kwiecień), którego przykre doświadczenia sprzed lat odbijają się na psychice całej rodziny. Wzruszająca historia o bezgranicznej miłości, przeznaczeniu, poczuciu winy i ponoszeniu konsekwencji za swoje czyny.

programme.title: Nie jesteś w Danii
programme.desc: Dwaj nastoletni koledzy, Félix (Marley Duboscq) i Vincent (Joseph Pierre), włóczą się nocą po pustych uliczkach małego nadmorskiego miasteczka, szukając rozrywki. Ich bezcelowy wieczór przybiera nieoczekiwany obrót, kiedy wchodzą za ladę zamkniętego sklepu. Wraz z pojawieniem się w lokalu pierwszego klienta, muszą wcielić się w role sklepikarzy. Młodzieńcy nieświadomie dołączają do świata pracy.

programme.desc: Eyewitness: Directed by Peter Yates. With William Hurt, Sigourney Weaver, Christopher Plummer, James Woods. A janitor who claims he's seen a murder becomes romantically involved with the glamorous TV reporter covering the story." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0082353/","name":"Eyewitness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNmY2YyYzctNTZjYS00NjQ1LTkyMDUtYTVkYTdmZWM0YjQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000458/","name":"William Hurt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001626/","name":"Christopher Plummer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0946811/","name":"Peter Yates"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0856270/","name":"Steve Tesich"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eyewitness","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi765853977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDQwZDU0MDctNGI5NC00ZTcxLWEzODItNGVmNzI0ODJkZWQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDQwZDU0MDctNGI5NC00ZTcxLWEzODItNGVmNzI0ODJkZWQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Eyewitness"},"datePublished":"1981-02-13","description":"A janitor who claims he's seen a murder becomes romantically involved with the glamorous TV reporter covering the story.","keywords":"eccentric man,murder witness,janitor,murder,police detective","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0082353/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Paul-250"},"dateCreated":"1999-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"An unusual thriller","reviewBody":"William Hurt stars as the brooding janitor in this sub-Hitchcockian thriller directed by Peter Yates (Bullitt). No-one in the film is quite what they seem, and Hurt plays the role of ambivalent hero/anti hero intelligently. Sigourney Weaver shows what a fine actress she really is whilst Christopher Plummer adds gravitas to the proceedings. Like Benton's Still Of The Night the film is well-crafted and often intriguing. Definitely well worth watching.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4502,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Hologram for the King
Hologram dla króla
programme.desc:
A Hologram for the King: Directed by Tom Tykwer. With Tom Hanks, Omar Elba, Sarita Choudhury, Sidse Babett Knudsen. A failed American sales rep looks to recoup his losses by traveling to Saudi Arabia and selling his company's product to a wealthy monarch." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2980210/","name":"A Hologram for the King","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODM3Zjk2MGYtMzNiZC00OGVhLTlhODgtYTg4NjU3NzdjYTI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjgyNjk3MzE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4025491/","name":"Omar Elba"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002004/","name":"Sarita Choudhury"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055954/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0409391/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0267332/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1101630/","name":"Dave Eggers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi939767065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4NTUyMjY1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg5MjAzODE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4NTUyMjY1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg5MjAzODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Cultures collide when an American businessman (Tom Hanks) is sent to Saudi Arabia to close what he hopes will be the deal of a lifetime. Baffled by local customs and stymied by an opaque bureaucracy, he eventually finds his footing with the help of a wise-cracking taxi driver (Alexander Black) and a beautiful Saudi doctor (Sarita Choudhury)."},"datePublished":"2016-04-28","description":"A failed American sales rep looks to recoup his losses by traveling to Saudi Arabia and selling his company's product to a wealthy monarch.","keywords":"backhoe,male in a shower,skin diving,overhead camera shot,cell phone","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2980210/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"redd0487"},"dateCreated":"2019-02-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a masterpiece, but enjoyable and easy-watching.","reviewBody":"It is a movie that you will forget very soon. There is nothing new and it made me fell that I was waiting all the time for something to happen. Also, there is a strange atmosphere in the movie, like everyone is plotting against Tom Hanks.

BUT, once you understand that that is the goal of the movie (lack of plot twist, the strange atmosphere, etc.), it becomes kinda enjoyable (I wish I had understood that sooner to better enjoy the history). And I think the "strange atmosphere" is done due the big different of culture in Saudi Arabia, so that is a big pro. It have a nice photography and good acting, and they show a lot of culture of Saudi Arabia (I think that is one of the best in this movie. It's similar to a documentary, in that aspect).

There is no strong comedy or drama, although they should cut some of the drama there, but, If you don't expect too much and want to watch something unpretentiously you can watch this film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41846,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

A young girl grows up to become a strong and fearless woman in Budapest before World War I." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5855772/","name":"Napszállta","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJkNTFhMzQtOTJjMy00NmNkLWJjMDItZjFiYjg4ZTRiNzY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTgxNDIzMTY@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3769837/","name":"Juli Jakab"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412096/","name":"Vlad Ivanov"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7257783/","name":"Evelin Dobos"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1841577/","name":"László Nemes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0123200/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0143783/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0475594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1841577/","name":"László Nemes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6600340/","name":"Clara Royer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3093523/","name":"Matthieu Taponier"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2984098329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU4MzY0ODMtYmI1NS00NmZiLTllYjYtMjhjZTliODk1ZGI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU4MzY0ODMtYmI1NS00NmZiLTllYjYtMjhjZTliODk1ZGI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"1913, Budapest, in the heart of Europe as World War I approaches. The young Irisz Leiter arrives in the Hungarian capital with high hopes to work as a milliner at Leiter, the legendary hat store that once belonged to her late parents; but she is quickly sent away by the new owner, Oszkár Brill. While preparations are under way at the store, to host important, wealthy, royal guests, a man abruptly comes to Irisz, looking for a Kálmán Leiter, who he says is her brother. Refusing to leave the city, the young woman follows Kálmán's tracks, her only link to a lost past. Her quest brings her through the dark streets of Budapest, where only the Leiter hat store shines, into the turmoil of a civilization on the eve of its downfall."},"datePublished":"2018-09-27","description":"A young girl grows up to become a strong and fearless woman in Budapest before World War I.","keywords":"long take,austro hungarian empire,female protagonist,anarchism,prostitution","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5855772/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccrc28"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Boring and pointless","reviewBody":"Movie very boring with something about to happen which never happen. Why make a such extended film for a so small story?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3900,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT2H22M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tamtej nocy
programme.desc: Zuzanna Szwarc (Hanna Konarowska), mama kilkuletniej dziewczynki, pracuje jako kuratorka sztuki. Pewnego wieczoru widzi napad. Dwóch mężczyzna atakuje chłopaka. Zuza nie pozostaje obojętna i stara się go obronić. Kiedy na miejsce przybywa policja, to jednak ona, nie sprawcy pobicia, zostaje aresztowana.

programme.title: Myszy i szczury
programme.desc: Dramatyczne losy małego Adasia (Miłosz Kwiecień), którego przykre doświadczenia sprzed lat odbijają się na psychice całej rodziny. Wzruszająca historia o bezgranicznej miłości, przeznaczeniu, poczuciu winy i ponoszeniu konsekwencji za swoje czyny.

credits.actor: Michał Krzywicki
Kacper Anuszewski
Rafał Gerlach
Krzysztof Rogucki, Sylwia Gola, Wojciech Chorąży

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Zimny poranek w odkrywkowej kopalni kruszców. Krzysztof (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna pierwszy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika. Wyraźnie nie pasuje on do środowiska pracowników fizycznych. W trosce o własną pozycję, zamierza trzymać dyscyplinę twardą ręką. Nagły wypadek, którego ofiarą staje się jeden z ukraińskich robotników, wystawia zasady moralne Krzysztofa na próbę. Zdaje on sobie sprawę z tego, że łatwo być stanowczym tylko w sprzyjających okolicznościach. Jednak trudno mu przeciwstawić się złu, kiedy w grę wchodzą dramatyczne konsekwencje.

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damięcki
Artem Manuilov
Andrzej Grabowski
Maciej Stuhr, Magdalena Cielecka, Piotr Głowacki
Maciej Stuhr, Magdalena Cielecka, Piotr Głowacki

programme.title: Królowie soulu
programme.desc: Zima 1965 roku, Chicago. Teatr Regal gości Jamesa Browna (Lee Fields) oraz Solomona Burke'a (Avant Strangel), dwie legendy muzyki soul. Za kulisami obaj są pod ogromną presją. Mężczyźni zdają sobie sprawę z tego, że ich utwory mają niesamowitą moc i są zdolne poruszyć duszę.

credits.actor: Lee Fields
China Moses
Avant Strangel

mill,lumber","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3922816/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"edhart08"},"dateCreated":"2015-06-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent all-round Aussie Production","reviewBody":"I was lucky enough to see this film today at the Sydney Film Festival....adapted from Henrik Ibsens late 19th century play ''The Wild Duck'' but totally rewritten and retold into a modern Australian story set,maybe in the logging areas of Tasmania but actually filmed around the very atmospheric Snowy Mountain towns of Tumut and Batlow. The acting is superb, particularly the wonderful Ewen Leslie who just gets more magnificent in each role he takes on...Script and cinematography add to the overall brilliance of this terrific Jan Chapman production....a must see for all lovers of great Aussie films both here and overseas...I cant wait to see it again on its general release","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4907,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

mill,lumber","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3922816/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"edhart08","dateCreated":"2015-06-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent all-round Aussie Production","reviewBody":"I was lucky enough to see this film today at the Sydney Film Festival....adapted from Henrik Ibsens late 19th century play ''The Wild Duck'' but totally rewritten and retold into a modern Australian story set,maybe in the logging areas of Tasmania but actually filmed around the very atmospheric Snowy Mountain towns of Tumut and Batlow. The acting is superb, particularly the wonderful Ewen Leslie who just gets more magnificent in each role he takes on...Script and cinematography add to the overall brilliance of this terrific Jan Chapman production....a must see for all lovers of great Aussie films both here and overseas...I cant wait to see it again on its general release","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4907,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sole
Sole
programme.desc: Sole: Directed by Carlo Sironi. With Claudio Segaluscio, Sandra Drzymalska, Bruno Buzzi, Marco Felli. Lena is seven months pregnant and she's ready to sell the baby in her belly. Ermanno agrees to pretend to be the father. Fabio, the uncle of Ermanno, will pay them to buy the child that he and his wife Bianca cannot have. A fake adoption between relatives, a loophole to bypass the law cause in Italy the surrogate motherhood is forbidden. A world in which money is the only standard of value, the only thing that matter. Ermanno and Lena are two strangers that must pretend in public to be a couple and live together until the delivery. They are used to only think about themselves and they fight all the time. But living side by side they start becoming what they were only pretending to be." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9648994/","name":"Sole","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYwMjI2YjUtMzAyOS00YWViLWJiY2UtYzcwZTliYjk5YTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzMxMDgxNjc@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10421676/","name":"Claudio Segaluscio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8272878/","name":"Sandra Drzymalska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125644/","name":"Bruno Buzzi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0802910/","name":"Carlo Sironi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0398661/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0349562/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2664958/","name":"Antonio Manca"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3752255/","name":"Giulia Moriggi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0802910/","name":"Carlo Sironi"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2633482009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYzYjlkN2UtODFlNy00Yjg3LTgyYzItYjlhMTMzMTY5YzQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYzYjlkN2UtODFlNy00Yjg3LTgyYzItYjlhMTMzMTY5YzQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"datePublished":"2019-10-24","description":"Lena is seven months pregnant and she's ready to sell the baby in her belly. programme.title: Midsommar
Midsommar. W biały dzień
programme.desc: Directed by Ari Aster. With Florence Pugh, Jack Reynor, Vilhelm Blomgren, William Jackson Harper. A couple travels to Scandinavia to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

programme.title: Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road
Ale jazda!
programme.desc:
Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road: Directed by Bob Gale. With Matthew Edison, Paul Brogren, Wayne Robson, Gary Oldman. Neal Oliver, a very confused young man and an artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway I60 that doesn't exist on any of the maps, going to the places he never even heard of, searching for an answer and his dreamgirl." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0165832/","name":"Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYwYzlhOTAtNDAwMC00ZTBhLWI4M2QtMTA1NmJhYTdiNTkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM0NTU5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005188/","name":"James Marsden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000198/","name":"Gary Oldman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000621/","name":"Kurt Russell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301826/","name":"Bob Gale"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022335/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040305/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0039180/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301826/","name":"Bob Gale"}],"datePublished":"2003-09-10","description":"Neal Oliver, a very confused young man and an artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway I60 that doesn't exist on any of the maps, going to the places he never even heard of, searching for an answer and his dreamgirl.","keywords":"road trip,alternate reality,magic 8 ball,road movie,time warp","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0165832/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tramsbottom"},"dateCreated":"2004-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"The very definition of 'underrated gem'","reviewBody":"This brilliantly original film somehow bypassed theatres due to the usual studio stupidity. An intelligent, offbeat road movie with fantasy elements is a hard thing to sell, so they don't bother and the film eventually limps its way onto DVD.

With a bit more money this could have been one of the best films ever. As it is, director Bob Gale makes the best of things and it's a reflection on how strong the story is that he can get away with it on a measly budget. There are great cameos from Michael J.Fox and Kurt Russell amongst others.

Like Donnie Darko, this is a weird little indie film you may never have heard of but buying the DVD will be one of the best choices you'll make.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":30542,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Moonlighting
Fucha
programme.desc: Moonlighting: Directed by Jerzy Skolimowski. With Jeremy Irons, Eugene Lipinski, Jirí Stanislav, Eugeniusz Haczkiewicz. A Polish contractor, Nowak, leads a group of workmen to London so they can provide cheap labor for a government official based there. Nowak (Irons) has to manage the project and the men as they encounter the tempations of the West and loneliness and separation from their families. Nowak is the only one of the group who speaks English, and he uses this as a tool over his team. When the unrest in Poland leads to a military takeover, Nowak is faced with a much more difficult situation than he expected." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0084354/","name":"Moonlighting","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Y0M2I3ZWItYTRjZi00YTAyLTliYWQtZGM3YzhiMDBmY2NiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTIyNzY1NzM@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0513468/","name":"Eugene Lipinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822321/","name":"Jirí Stanislav"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0804592/","name":"Jerzy Skolimowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103461/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159436/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0804592/","name":"Jerzy Skolimowski"}],"description":"A Polish contractor, Nowak, leads a group of workmen to London so they can provide cheap labor for a government official based there. Nowak (Irons) has to manage the project and the men as they encounter the tempations of the West an","keywords":"british renaissance,immigrant,immigration,poland,solidarity","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084354/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LauraLeeWasHere"},"dateCreated":"2015-10-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Peanut Gallery","reviewBody":"This film is a mesmerizing and strangely addictive story about a man who buys a dilapidated condo in London and hires and transports several Polish builders to London to renovate it because they will work for a cheaper amount than the unionized English workers. Except for the foreman (in an early role by Jeremy Irons) none of them speak English and the foreman doesn't tell his employer or his co- workers when they overshoot the budget and run out of money.\n\nTrying to figure out HOW he will get the job done and WHY he is going to such great lengths and pains becomes all consuming mental and emotional puzzles as you become sucked into this well written story and tour de force performance by Jeremy Irons. By the second half of the film, you can't bare to watch but can't stand to look away. (It's as if you meant to eat only a few peanuts to suddenly discover you've consumed the entire amount and didn't even notice) I think this film is best described as "Escapism" rather than "Enjoyment" but either way you won't be focused on anything else while you're watching it. In fact the "taste" of it lingered with me for days after I saw it. It's full of a quiet yet constantly building tension, with a capital 'T'. No car chases, big explosions, explicit sex, swearing or violence. Just a well constructed screen gem that seemed to have fallen through the cracks when it was released in the early 1980's.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2682,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

Monroe"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054536/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0408885/","name":"Raul Inglis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1878140/","name":"Rafael Jordan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Curse of the Dragon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4222331673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTczZTkxMjctMTBlYi00YjZlLWJhOGItNjEyYTYxYmE2Y2E4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTczZTkxMjctMTBlYi00YjZlLWJhOGItNjEyYTYxYmE2Y2E4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Curse of the Dragon"},"datePublished":"2011-09-10","description":"A brave knight returns to his homeland to find a powerful dragon terrorizing his village. The young man is warned by his elder to: " "Beware the Jabberwock, my son! The jaws that bite, the claws that catch! Beware the Jubjub bird, and shun The frumious Bandersnatch!"

Carroll was only making a silly, meaningless poem, most likely to amuse his young friend,( whom "Alice Through the Looking Glass" was based upon) thus, the title "Jabberwocky" which has no meaning.

Based solely on your review Tim, I chased this movie down and watched it. Now I wish I could unsee what I saw. I always loved Jabberwocky, it being one of my favorite poems of all time. It is now somewhat ruined by this very lame attempt to create a Jabberwock and slay it on film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":605,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.5},"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="
